character.appearance:
His relentless pursuit of criminals, especially [[Jasper "Three Eyes" Flint|02 Worldbuilding/People/Jasper "Three Eyes" Flint]] and his organization, has made him legendary throughout the depths. ## Secrets
> [!warning] DM Only
> - His sahuagin parent was the leader of a resistance group during early submersion
> - Has been secretly feeding information to surface world authorities about deep threats
> - The iron teeth aren't just intimidation - they contain detection enchantments
> - Maintains a private file on corruption within the Imperial government
> - His squad includes members who are technically wanted criminals (reformed)
> - Has been having prophetic dreams about threats rising from the deepest trenches
> - The Emperor knows about his divided loyalties and approves

## Voice & Mannerisms

**Voice**: Sharp and precise

**Speech Pattern**: Casual and relaxed

**Physical Habits**: Maintains intense eye contact

## Motivations
1.
